entities.name: dungeon
entities.description: The setting where the events are taking place. The text states 'yelling, ‘Spotty! Spotty!’ in the dungeon.'

entities.name: peevs
entities.description: A ghost who is shooting mouldy peanuts at Hermione. The text states 'Peeves shot after her...'

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of the students who is present in the dungeon. The text states ‘Oh, dear,’ said Hermione sadly.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: A ghost who is a member of the Hogwarts staff. The text states 'Nearly Headless Nick now drifted towards them through the crowd.'

entities.name: the wailing widow
entities.description: A ghost who came from Kent to attend the event in the dungeon. The text states 'The Wailing Widow came all the way up from Kent...'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the students who is present in the dungeon. The text states ‘Harry started to clap too, but stopped quickly at the sight of Nick’s face.'

entities.name: the orchestra
entities.description: A group of people playing music in the dungeon. The text states 'The orchestra, however, stopped playing at that very moment.'

entities.name: the ghost horses
entities.description: A dozen ghost horses who burst through the dungeon wall. The text states 'Through the dungeon wall burst a dozen ghost horses...'

entities.name: the headless horsemen
entities.description: The people riding the ghost horses. The text states 'each ridden by a headless horseman.'

relationships.description: Nearly Headless Nick says he needs to warn the orchestra. The text states 'It’s nearly time for my speech, I’d better go and warn the orchestra...'
Nearly Headless Nick greets The Wailing Widow. The text states 'Not a bad turnout,' said Nearly Headless Nick proudly . ‘The Wailing Widow came all the way up from Kent...'

The orchestra stops playing at the moment when Nearly Headless Nick says he needs to warn them. The text states 'They , and everyone else in the dungeon, fell silent, looking around in excitement, as a hunting horn sounded.'

Nearly Headless Nick seems to be commanding or controlling the ghost horses. The text states 'Oh, here we go,’ said Nearly Headless Nick bitterly . Through the dungeon wall burst a dozen ghost horses...'
Harry sees Nearly Headless Nick's face. The text states 'The horses galloped into the middle of the dance floor and halted, rearing and plunging; a large ghost at the front, whose face Harry saw...'
Harry sees the ghost horses. The text states 'The horses galloped into the middle of the dance floor and halted, rearing and plunging; a large ghost at the front, whose face Harry saw...'}
